title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 663.9 - Items lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 663.9 - Items lists

State Regulations

The items lists are provided for the purpose of clearly
indicating the application of the prescribed accounting in specific cases. These lists are published separately by the director of the Office of

Accounting and Finance or his designee. Companies shall be guided by the lists
in recording the cost of specific assets in the telecommunications plant in
service detail accounts (accounts 2111 through 2690). These lists do not
comprise all of the items to be recorded in the specific accounts but are
considered to be representative of them. The appearance of an item in a list
warrants the recording of such item in the designated account only when the
text of the account also indicates inclusion in the account, inasmuch as the
same item frequently appears in more than one list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
663.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
